actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in Louisiana to the record owners of the surface of that property.

summary.text: Conveys all mineral interests of the United States in specified lands in Lafourche Parish, Louisiana, to the surface owners thereof.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in Louisiana to the record owners of the surface of that property.
